channel.title: The Bible and God
channel.description:
This channel mainly provides sermons on all kinds of topics. It is dedicated to conveying God’s will and helping brothers and sisters solve their confusion and difficulties in faith and life. There are international preachers from all over the world, who will be giving sermons on different topics every day. Here you will learn what you have never heard in your many years of belief in the Lord.
If you have any confusion and difficulties in your life and beliefs, and if you want to know more about God, understand His will, please subscribe to this channel and each sermon will bring you inspiration. May God bless you.
If you are interested in this topic, please feel free to contact us.
Gospel Hotline: +1 917 365 9109 Official Website: https://thebibleandgod.github.io/ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@TheBibleandGod Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheBibleAndGod202303 Messenger: https://m.me/TheBibleAndGod202303?ref=skmz--podcast Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thebibleandgod2023/ WhatsApp: https://wa.me/19173659109 Twitter: https://twitter.com/BibleandGod2023

item.title: Why is there so much suffering
item.description:
Come attend our sermons online. By listening to the international preacher, you can resolve any of your difficulties and confusion in life and faith.


Everyone will encounter all kinds of painful and sad things in life, such as spiritual emptiness, disharmony with our spouses, the torment of illness, and all kinds of pressures in life. So why is life so full of suffering? How can we escape the painful life?


If you are interested in this topic, please feel free to contact us.

item.author: The Bible and God

item.title: How Should We Draw Near to God so We Can Receive His Blessing?
item.description:
Come attend our sermons online. By listening to the preacher’s sermon, you can resolve any of your difficulties and confusion in life and faith.


“Draw near to God, and He will draw near to you” (James 4:8). Clearly, we should often draw near to God to keep a normal relationship with Him; only in this way can we gain God’s blessing and guidance in life and work. Then how should we get close to God? Click the blue link to contact us and we would like to share with you the way. As long as you practice more according to these principles, you will have a closer relationship with God.


If you are interested in this topic, please feel free to contact us.


Gospel Hotline: +917 365 9109

Official Website

YouTube

Facebook

Messenger

Instagram

WhatsApp

Twitter
item.author: The Bible and God

item.title: How to have a happy marriage
item.description:
Come attend our sermons online. By listening to the preacher’s sermon, you can resolve any of your difficulties and confusion in life and faith.


There are thousands of marriages in the world, but no matter what kind of marriage they have, a husband and a wife will inevitably have various conflicts caused by things, such as being suspected, being snubbed, being betrayed, and different living habits. The conflicts lead to tensions and estrangement between them. If they fail to handle these problems properly, their relationship will grow farther and farther, and even a marriage crisis will appear. So how should we deal with marital conflicts? What should we do so as to have happy marriages?


If you are interested in this topic, please feel free to contact us.


Gospel Hotline: +917 365 9109
